descripcion: As a professional, I have worked in various roles, from full-stack developer to project leader and DevOps. I consider myself a committed and dedicated professional focused on planning and executing projects in different technologies. I enjoy maintaining smooth communication with the teams I work with, collaborating to ensure everything goes well. Additionally, I am very curious and always willing to learn new tools and methodologies to improve my work and keep my technology knowledge up-to-date.

experiencia.descripcion: Working in several teams as a full-stack developer, developing end-to-end solutions (frontend, backend, and database), primarily for the SGI application of Swiss Medical, and participating in maintaining and developing new features for the production middleware (using a stack of Java, Spring, JavaScript, Jquery, Bootstrap, SQL Server, and Sybase).

Project leader, responsible from the requirements gathering phase to task division, planning, development, and deployment of new products in multiple technologies depending on the project (mainly Java with Spring Boot and Python with Flask or Django).

DevOps, my role was to ensure collaboration between development and operations teams for efficient code deployment in production. Optimizing development, testing, and operations processes, creating and implementing tools (mostly in Python and Bash), workflows (like Gitflow, centralized configuration with Cloud Config, etc.), and pipelines (Jenkins or GitLab CI). These tasks also included migrating from on-premises to AWS (setting up environments with Terraform, converting Jenkins pipelines to GitLab CI + ArgoCD, creating Kubernetes clusters, etc.).
Participating in all kinds of projects with AWS and Azure, from infrastructure creation to implementing CI/CD pipelines, serverless services creation, etc.
